original_title: MTG Asking Uncomfortable Questions About MIGA Influencers After Israeli Pedo "Escapes" United States  — The Donald
article_summary: Marjorie Taylor Greene questions the release of a child sex predator from Israel, who works under the Israeli Prime Minister, and criticizes the lack of response from conservative figures like Mark Levin and Laura Loomer. The post sparks a discussion about unconditional Jewish support and Israel's influence.</s>
